{{cpp/memory/synchronized_pool_resource/title|do_is_equal}}
{{cpp/memory/synchronized_pool_resource/navbar}}
{{ddcl|since=c++17|1=
virtual bool do_is_equal( const std::pmr::memory_resource&amp; other ) const noexcept;
}}

Compare {{c|*this}} with {{c|other}} for identity - memory allocated using a {{tt|synchronized_pool_resource}} can only be deallocated using that same resource.

{{c|1=this == &amp;other}}
